import React, {Component} from 'react'; import './App.css'; import {Container, Nav} from "./components/styled-components"; import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css"; import {Bar} from 'react-chartjs-2'; import axios from 'axios'; class App extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props); this.onChangeCity = this.onChangeCity.bind(this); this.onChangeCountry = this.onChangeCountry.bind(this); this.onChangeProvince = this.onChangeProvince.bind(this); this.onSubmit = this.onSubmit.bind(this); this.state = { Country: "United States of America", Province: "North Carolina", City: "Mecklenburg", queriedData: [{Country: "Loading...", Province: "Loading...", City: "Loading...", Deaths: 0, Date:"Loading...", Active:0, Confirmed: 0}], graphData:{}, lastMax: { Deaths: 0, Active: 0, Confirmed: 0, Recovered: 0 } } } render(){ return (
Coronavirus Dashboard Created and Maintained by Hari Shankar
Total Deaths 7329148 Total Confirmed Cases 9382470 Total Active Cases 9382470 ); } } export default App;
